byline.contributor: Cecilia Li and Vanessa Piao contributed research from Beijing.

abstract: Ordinary Chinese citizens who jumped into euphoria of nation's bull market face sobering reality now that rally has ended; steep decline has touched off national debate about wealth in society caught between lure of quick riches and egalitarianism of its socialist past.
lead_paragraph: The decline of a bull market, seen by some investors as their ticket to riches, has led to broken dreams, strained relationships and a sense of insecurity.

headline.main: Stock Downturn Hits Chinese Investors in the Heart, Not Just the Wallet
headline.print_headline: A Blow to Wallets and Hearts

snippet: The decline of a bull market, seen by some investors as their ticket to riches, has led to broken dreams, strained relationships and a sense of insecurity.
